project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple contact book that allows the user to add, search, update, and delete contacts while storing the information in a JSON file.

task.name: Implement functionality to add new contacts to the JSON file
Implement functionality to search for contacts in the JSON file
Implement functionality to update existing contacts in the JSON file
Implement functionality to delete contacts from the JSON file
Write tests for each of the features above (add, search, update, delete)
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
